column6: Built-in Bluetooth; easy to program with Arduino IDE
Match length to keyboard (61 or 88 keys); limit brightness to ~30–40%
Solder across +5V and GND near LED strip input
Add in Week 4 (not needed for MVP)

column1: > ⚠️ **Power tip:** Full-white can draw ~60 mA per LED. Keep brightness low and/or test short sections first. Always **share ground** between ESP32 and LED strip.
